metadata.Title: CVE-2022-26383 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description:
When resizing a popup after requesting fullscreen access, the popup wouldnot display the fullscreen notification. This vulnerability affects Firefox< 98, Firefox ESR < 91.7, and Thunderbird < 91.7.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-26383` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 1:1snap1-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

thunderbird - 1:91.7.0+build2-0ubuntu1
thunderbird-gnome-support - 1:91.7.0+build2-0ubuntu1
thunderbird-mozsymbols - 1:91.7.0+build2-0ubuntu1
xul-ext-calendar-timezones - 1:91.7.0+build2-0ubuntu1
xul-ext-gdata-provider - 1:91.7.0+build2-0ubuntu1
xul-ext-lightning - 1:91.7.0+build2-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firefox package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:1snap1-0ubuntu1').
thunderbird package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:91.7.0+build2-0ubuntu1').
mozjs78 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
